status.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the official legal position or condition of a person, group, country etc
status.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: These documents have no legal status in Britain.
What is your marital status (=are you married or not)?
status.translation[0].definitions[1].def: your social or professional rank or position, considered in relation to other people
status.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Doctors have traditionally enjoyed high social status.
status.translation[0].definitions[2].def: respect and importance that someone or something is given
status.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: Mandela’s status as a world leader
status.translation[0].note_box[0].headin: – Meaning 2: your social or professional rank or position, considered in relation to other people
status.translation[0].note_box[0].sectio: They were men of high status and great influence.
People who work as carers have low status in our society.
In parts of the world, women still have inferior status.
They looked entirely at ease with their exalted status.
Workers of equal status should be rewarded equally.
I lied about my family’s social status.
migrant farm workers and others of low socioeconomic status
His ambition was to attain the highest professional status.
Here, old people are respected and have high social status.
status.translation[1].definitions[0].def: the legal position or condition of a company, group, person etc
status.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: What is the company’s financial status?
Ideally, the top professional buyer will seek Board status as the company 's senior buyer.
status.translation[1].definitions[1].def: your social or professional rank or position, considered in relation to other people
status.translation[1].definitions[2].def: respect and importance that people give to something or someone
status.translation[1].definitions[2].exa: Rice-farming has a special status in Japan.
status.translation[1].definitions[3].def: a situation at a particular time, especially in an argument, discussion etc
status.translation[1].definitions[3].exa: What is the status of the trade talks?
